name: A Snowball's Chance in Hell
description:
This is a short (and probably pretty easy) game I made in Puzzlescript.

Upon preparing to do a short tutorial for the Iowa City Game Dev meetup, I realized I had never actually finished making a Puzzlescript game, so I figured I should probably give it a shot if I was going to pretend to be an authority on the topic!

If you're interested in making your own levels or even changing the game's mechanics entirely, you can edit the source code yourself!

Thanks to increpare for this amazing little engine!
